body:
[Unreliable Clock]: "It's morning." 

[1] "Did you just talk?" 
[2] "Thanks Mr. Clock." 
[3] "I'm not sure if I'm ready for this." [LEAVE]
title: Start

body:
[Unreliable Clock]: "Of course not, I'm a clock." 

[1] "Get out of my head." 
[2] "Bye then." [LEAVE]
title: DidTalk

body:
[Unreliable Clock]: "You're welcome." 

[1] "Please, get out of my head." 
[2] "You're welcome!" 
[3] [Forget what just happened for the sake of your sanity and LEAVE]
title: Thanks

body:
[Unreliable Clock]: The clock ticks erratically, but you're not sure if it's real or just in your head. 

[You]: You now understand what the Tutorial Agent meant with "Remember, beware of time". 

[1] [Leave this cursed place and never come back]
title: GetOut
